abstract: Citigroup is in early negotiations with the Securities and Exchange Commission to settle a probe into whether it misled investors by not properly disclosing the amount of troubled mortgage assets it held as the markets started to fall in 2007, The Wall Street Journal reported.

lead_paragraph: Citigroup is in early negotiations with the Securities and Exchange Commission to settle a probe into whether it misled investors by not properly disclosing the amount of troubled mortgage assets it held as the markets started to fall in 2007, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Citi in Talks to Settle S.E.C. Investigation, Report Says
